name: Fever Dreams
description: Partially inspired by Never Ending Nightmares, this game has you waking up from a nightmare, but you're still in a nightmare. Each one more terrifying than the last. Nightmares, or more specifically, fever dreams, don't make sense. You might end up somewhere that you never went to. You're just there, now. Things might get distorted and/or overall, go horribly wrong.
